title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 01, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 01, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Web Archiving
items.content_text:
### Tools & Software / Search & Discovery

*   [SecurityTrails](https://securitytrails.com/) - Web based archive for WHOIS and DNS records. REST API available free of charge.
items.content_html:
Tools & Software / Search & Discovery

  • SecurityTrails - Web based archive for WHOIS and DNS records. REST API available free of charge.

items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Resources / Learning

*   [Nix from First Principles: Flake Edition](https://tonyfinn.com/blog/nix-from-first-principles-flake-edition/) - A modern crash-course to using Nix features, Flakes, and developing with Nix.
*   [Zero to Nix](https://zero-to-nix.com/) - A flake-centric guide to Nix and its concepts created by Determinate Systems to quickly onboard beginners.
items.content_html:
Resources / Learning

  • Nix from First Principles: Flake Edition - A modern crash-course to using Nix features, Flakes, and developing with Nix.
  • Zero to Nix - A flake-centric guide to Nix and its concepts created by Determinate Systems to quickly onboard beginners.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

*   [vod2pod-rss (⭐300)](https://github.com/madiele/vod2pod-rss) `⚠` - Convert YouTube and Twitch channels to podcasts, no storage required. Transcodes VoDs to MP3 192k on the fly, generates an RSS feed to use in podcast clients. `MIT` `Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

  • vod2pod-rss (⭐300) ⚠ - Convert YouTube and Twitch channels to podcasts, no storage required. Transcodes VoDs to MP3 192k on the fly, generates an RSS feed to use in podcast clients. MIT Docker

items.title: Awesome Newsletters
items.content_text:
### JavaScript / React

*   [Nextjs Weekly](https://nextjsweekly.com/). A newsletter of the best Next.js articles, tools and projects.

### Swift / Svelte

*   [Indie Watch](https://indie.watch/). Weekly interviews with successful iOS & macOS developers about strategies and tips you can use to create profitable indie apps.
items.content_html:
JavaScript / React

  • Nextjs Weekly. A newsletter of the best Next.js articles, tools and projects.

Swift / Svelte

  • Indie Watch. Weekly interviews with successful iOS & macOS developers about strategies and tips you can use to create profitable indie apps.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Audio

*   [umidiparser (⭐38)](https://github.com/bixb922/umidiparser) - MIDI file parser for MicroPython, CircuitPython and Python.
items.content_html:
Audio

  • umidiparser (⭐38) - MIDI file parser for MicroPython, CircuitPython and Python.

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_html:
Modules / Utils

  • deno-envconfig (⭐2) - Configuration management utility.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [yagiziskirik/AirSupport.nvim (⭐9)](https://github.com/yagiziskirik/AirSupport.nvim) - Searchable reminder window for your custom shortcuts and commands.

### Code Runner / Diagnostics

*   [google/executor.nvim (⭐148)](https://github.com/google/executor.nvim) - Allows you to run command line tasks in the background and be notified of results.
items.content_html:
Utility / Diagnostics

  • yagiziskirik/AirSupport.nvim (⭐9) - Searchable reminder window for your custom shortcuts and commands.

Code Runner / Diagnostics

  • google/executor.nvim (⭐148) - Allows you to run command line tasks in the background and be notified of results.

items.title: Awesome Esolangs
items.content_text:
### Languages

*   [COW](https://esolangs.org/wiki/COW) - Brainfuck variant using twelve variations of *moos* as instructions.
*   [Malbolge](https://esolangs.org/wiki/Malbolge) - Named after the 8th level of hell, is designed to be as difficult as possible to program.
items.content_html:
Languages

  • COW - Brainfuck variant using twelve variations of moos as instructions.
  • Malbolge - Named after the 8th level of hell, is designed to be as difficult as possible to program.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vue 3

*   [antdv-pro (⭐797)](https://github.com/antdv-pro/antdv-pro) - AntdvPro is a complete set of enterprise-level mid-backend front-end/design solutions based on Vue3, Vite4, ant-design-vue4, Pinia, UnoCSS and Typescript.
items.content_html:
Templates / Vue 3

  • antdv-pro (⭐797) - AntdvPro is a complete set of enterprise-level mid-backend front-end/design solutions based on Vue3, Vite4, ant-design-vue4, Pinia, UnoCSS and Typescript.
